info.author: Chris Bogart cbogart@cs.cmu.edu
info.abstract:
This component imports subsets of DiscourseDB datasets. To use this component you must first define a query in the DiscourseDB interface. To do so:
Log in using your google ID,
Select a dataset/database (far left dropdown)
Choose discourseParts (tree control below that)
Save that selection ("Remember" button in top center)
